column5: I see they’re giving a $25 gift card for  each $100 in store regular priced purchase.  Good deal
sure is! I grabbed a fishfinder last night...got me $250 in gift cards!
I spent $300 that day and got a $75 giftcard. I was told their Boxing Day sale will be 15-20% off. EDIT:  looks like some good deals are already up on their site minimum 15% off
